origin.em_origins.equidae.name: Equidae
origin.em_origins.equidae.description: Horses and Donkeys are sturdy creatures, often valued for their speed and carrying capability.
origin.em_origins.vulpes.name: Vulpes
origin.em_origins.vulpes.description: Foxes are small and nimble creatures known for their love of berries.
origin.em_origins.golmi.name: Golmi
origin.em_origins.golmi.description: Golems are often used as guardians. They are slightly more bulky than other creatures.
origin.em_origins.sphagnum.name: Sphagnum
origin.em_origins.sphagnum.description: Creepers are explosive creatures and somehow always behind you.
origin.em_origins.terram_draconis.name: Terram Draconis
origin.em_origins.terram_draconis.descri: Now nearly extinct, dragons are a powerful race of flying creatures often associated with the end.
power.em_origins.berry_lover.name: Berry lover
power.em_origins.berry_lover.description: You are a massive fan of berries. They fill you more and sting you less.
power.em_origins.big.name: Big
power.em_origins.big.description: You are slightly taller than normal.
power.em_origins.dragon_breath.name: Dragon Breath
power.em_origins.dragon_breath.descripti: You can launch a dragon fireball, which leaves a caustic area behind on impact.
power.em_origins.dragon_crystal.name: Crystal Master
power.em_origins.dragon_crystal.descript: Nearby endercrystals empower you, as long as there isn't a bigger dragon around
power.em_origins.dragon_wings.name: Dragon Wings
power.em_origins.dragon_wings.descriptio: You draconic wings granting you limited aerial mobility.
power.em_origins.explode.name: Explosive
power.em_origins.explode.description: You can explode, dealing significant damage to those around you including yourself. Also spreads potion effects.
power.em_origins.fast_metabolism.name: Fast Metabolism
power.em_origins.fast_metabolism.descrip: You need to eat more often and potion effects last shorter.
power.em_origins.frail.name: Frail
power.em_origins.frail.description: You have 2 hearts less than normal.
power.em_origins.heavy.name: Heavy
power.em_origins.heavy.description: You are heavy, causing you to sink like a brick and move slower.
power.em_origins.less_hunger.name: Less Hunger
power.em_origins.less_hunger.description: You need to eat less often.
power.em_origins.nimble.name: Nimble
power.em_origins.nimble.description: You take significantly less fall damage
power.em_origins.no_air.name: Anaerobic
power.em_origins.no_air.description: You don't require air to survive.
power.em_origins.no_fall.name: Good Knees
power.em_origins.no_fall.description: You don't take any fall damage.
power.em_origins.no_regen.name: No health regen
power.em_origins.no_regen.description: You can't regenerate health without potions or other means.
power.em_origins.pack_animal.name: Pack Animal
power.em_origins.pounce.name: Pounce
power.em_origins.pounce.description: You can pounce to attack your enemies.
power.em_origins.small.name: Small
power.em_origins.small.description: You are half your normal size. This allows you to fit into 1 high holes, but you might struggle climbing.
power.em_origins.sneaky.name: Sneaky
power.em_origins.sneaky.description: You can hide from enemies by sneaking, just don't get to close
power.em_origins.strong_arms.name: Strong Arms
power.em_origins.strong_arms.description: Your strong arms have more knockback and deal more unarmed damage
power.em_origins.strong_legs.name: Strong legs
power.em_origins.strong_legs.description: Your strong legs allow you to jump farther and run faster.
power.em_origins.vegetarian.name: Vegetarian
power.em_origins.weak_arms.name: Weak Arms
power.em_origins.weak_arms.description: Your arms are weak, dealing less melee and arrow damage.
